scripts.vagrant:k8s:token: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config ~/.kube/bare-metal-config -n kube-system describe secret $(kubectl --kubeconfig ~/.kube/bare-metal-config -n kube-system get secret | grep admin-user | awk '{print $1}')
scripts.traefik:dashboard: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods --selector 'app.kubernetes.io/name=traefik' --output=name -n traefik) 9000:9000 -n traefik & google-chrome-stable http://localhost:9000/dashboard/
scripts.grafana:dashboard: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods -n monitoring -o name | grep grafana) 3000 -n monitoring & google-chrome-stable http://localhost:3000 & echo 'grafana default user is admin/prom-operator'
scripts.prometheus:dashboard: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods -n monitoring -o name | grep kube-prometheus-prometheus) 9090 -n monitoring & google-chrome-stable http://localhost:9090
scripts.ceph:password: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config kubectl -n rook-ceph get secret rook-ceph-dashboard-password -o jsonpath="{['data']['password']}" | base64 --decode && echo
scripts.ceph:dashboard: KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/bare-metal.config kubectl port-forward svc/rook-ceph-mgr-dashboard 7000 -n rook-ceph & google-chrome-stable http://localhost:9090 & yarn ceph:password
scripts.k8s:token: kubectl -n kube-system describe secret $(kubectl -n kube-system get secret | grep admin-user | awk '{print $1}')
